# Quiver Development Plans

Actionable plans for extending the Quiver audio synthesis library.

## Documents

| Document | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [modules.md](modules.md) | DSP modules to implement (Reverb, EQ, Wavetable, etc.) |
| [docs-and-examples.md](docs-and-examples.md) | Missing examples and documentation |

## Contributing

1. Pick an item from one of the plans
2. Create a feature branch
3. Implement with tests (aim for >90% coverage)
4. Run `make check` before PR
5. Update the relevant plan document
